note.p: Wuji 屋脊 refers to tile-covered roof ridge in traditional Chinese architecture.

Meaning literally building (wu 屋) spine (ji 脊), ji originally referred the central bone and flesh along the back of humans or animals and was metaphorically extended to describe raised central portions of objects, hence its application to the raised section of traditional buildings. In literature from the Eastern Han dynasty through the Northern Song dynasty, wuji generally referred to the top of a sloping roof, encompassing both interior structural elements and exterior roof surfaces. In Yingzao fashi this term occurs in the section on tile works methods (wazuo zhidu 瓦作制度) which explains how to build tiled roof ridges. This architectural definition has remained consistent since then.

The terminology for describing wuji 屋脊 in different positions has evolved since its first systematic use in Yingzao fashi. This manual introduced specific terms for roof ridges in different positions: zhengji 正脊 (main ridge), boji 搏脊, chuiji 垂脊 (descending ridge), and jiaoji 角脊 (corner ridge). These terms remained largely stable throughout the Ming and Qing dynasties. During the Qing dynasty, two new terms emerged: qiangji 戧脊 (bracing ridge) and chaji 岔脊 (branching ridge), describing the ridges at the corners of hip-gable roofs. In the early twentieth century Liang Sicheng redefined several of these terms. Contemporary scholarship draws from both historical sources and modern academic discourse, leading to inconsistencies in their use, especially regarding the terms for ridges at the corners (see illustration).

“屋脊”作為建築術語，指屋面上瓦作的條狀隆起。“脊”的本意指人或動物背部中間的骨肉，即脊骨（《说文解字》（许 2021,12.9a））。“脊”也由此衍生指代物體中間高起的部分，房屋中間高起的部分即“屋脊”。 自東漢至北宋的古代文獻記載中，“屋脊”泛指坡屋頂的最高處，可指室內空間也可指室外屋面。（如《说文解字系传》（徐 1987, 112）;《谭宾录》（胡 1996,10.3a） ）至北宋《營造法式》，“瓦作制度”專門設“壘屋脊”條目， 明確將“屋脊”一詞用以指代屋面上瓦作的條狀隆起。（李 2009,13.3a）自此在建築語境中“屋脊”的詞義長期穩定。

自《營造法式》至今，描述不同位置之“屋脊”的名詞體系有所變遷。《營造法式》中首次出現以“正脊”、“搏脊”、“垂脊”、“角脊”定義不同位置的“屋脊”。至明清時期，其用法整體穩定。在清代則另有出現“戧脊”、 “岔脊”二詞以指代歇山轉角之脊。梁思成等學者在著述中對以上“屋脊”的名詞體系作了重新梳理，使之出現較大轉變。尤其是“垂脊”一詞指代範圍擴大和“角脊”指代範圍縮小。（梁 1981,80；梁和刘 1935,4）受此影響，當代學者對同一位置 的屋脊可能使用多種不同的稱呼， “垂脊”、“角脊”、“戧脊”、“岔脊”等不同屋頂類型中的傾斜屋脊的指代關係尤為混亂。（齐 1999,34、270；王 1996,199、205、236;刘 1993,166;郭 2015,112）
